vclaim: Former U.S. Vice President Joe Biden once said he had "no empathy" for the plight of younger people.
title: Did U.S. Presidential Candidate Joe Biden Say He Had ‘No Empathy’ for the Plight of Younger People?
subtitle: A January 2018 video of the former U.S. vice president re-emerged in May 2019 after he announced his candidacy for president.
author: Dan MacGuill
